snippet: SUNKIN--Sanford Daniel. 7/14/24 - 7/17/16 All my life he has been my precious, caring, loving Brother. He was also special to my Raymond. Rest in Peace Dear Brother. Estelle 1/3...
lead_paragraph: SUNKIN--Sanford Daniel. 7/14/24 - 7/17/16 All my life he has been my precious, caring, loving Brother. He was also special to my Raymond. Rest in Peace Dear Brother. Estelle 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  SUNKIN, SANFORD DANIEL
